Exciting News: We're Officially Starting Meow Rescue!

Date: Recently

Hey there, cat lovers!


We have some huge news to share — Meow Rescue is officially in the process of becoming a registered nonprofit! Our paperwork is filed, our mission is clear, and we're excited to start this incredible journey of saving and rehoming cats in our community.


Our goal is simple: rescue, care for, and find loving homes for every cat and kitten we can reach. We believe every paw deserves a second chance, and we're building Meow Rescue from the ground up to make that happen.


Right now, we’re working hard behind the scenes — setting up our nonprofit status, creating foster and adoption programs, and getting everything ready to start helping cats very soon.


Stay tuned for updates as we grow! We’ll be sharing news about volunteer opportunities, foster programs, events, and of course — adorable adoptable cats.


Thank you for believing in us from the very beginning. We can’t wait to make a difference together!


The Meow Rescue Team

Back to Blog

Meow Rescue - Cat Adoption & Foster Care

Welcome to Meow Rescue, a home-based cat rescue in Pasco County, Florida, dedicated to rescuing, rehabilitating, and rehoming cats in need.

Our Mission

We believe every cat deserves a loving home. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to rescue, rehabilitate, and rehome cats in need throughout Pasco County.

Adopt a Cat

Looking for a furry companion? Browse our adorable cats available for adoption and find your perfect match!
